text:
Created attachment 22425
Contains JUnit test class and documents used for testing.

The text contained in the Shape (=AutoShape) objects inserted in a word 2007 document is not extracted.
The same issue appears with excel 2003 and excel 2007 documents.


Find in attachments the JUnit test class and the document used for testing.
We expected to extract the words "testdoc" and "test phrase".

Notes on the attached documents:

- the document "Office2007_Word_TextInShape.docx" contains the words "testdoc" and "test phrase" in shape created in the document.

"TestUnitPoi35Filter.java" is the JUnit class.
creator: grizolle_benedicte@emc.com
apache@gagravarr.org
text:
I think this is very similar to bug #45596, and the same thing about OCR applies here too!

https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=45596
